data.name: todoroki kun (roblox)
Lanis Flat Theme
Feedly - Full width grid view
data.description:
2019-12-01 - Support 4k screen
2017-08-06 - full artical width & icons
2017-07-08 - update header (reduce icons)
2017-05-23 - fixed 'save to board' btn which hovered on card.

Hey, guys, its the new version, so I have not check all the part of the style, just wrote the part I used.
And feedly offical css style is changes every some days. I use feedly almost daily, so I'll fixed it in short time. 
If there is some where you found strange, you can leave msg to me.

# log
* for 2016/8/8 test version, it looks coming soon.
* 2016/12/04, it looks update the version again. so, made a little update and i start use this one.
* 2016/12/15, update the top right botton groups.

data.name: 什么值得买 SMZDM
data.description:
大妈也恢复了三栏的选项，自用优化了一下。
---
１．发现频道改回老版3栏，提高阅读效率。  
２．文章增加窄版（竖屏或横屏半屏）优化，隐藏右侧aside，文章居中，去掉了位置飘忽的导航。  
---  
因为大妈没通过文章，那就当这个样式是个人使用了，所以添加一些修改，各种广告白白。  
1. 原创列表页滚动广告再见。  
2. 发现列表页半屏优化。

data.name: keybr.com
data.description:
Hide typing speed and score. Hide red foreground of wrongly typed characters.
All this to help user focus on correctness and not typing speed.

data.name: @ MEH
Zero Two background
data.description: This background is a character from the show/anime Darling in the Franxx. Zero Two is one of the stars of the show and it is a very honorable anime.This was made for discord but you can use it for other purposes, it may not work for other purposes though. I did not make this image, in fact all I did was search up Zero Two on Google and found it.
